relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare receives highest score in the global network criterion among SSE vendors in Forrester report
relatedBlades.subtitle: We cite our single-vendor SASE platform that modernizes your network and consolidates more security use cases
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare has been recognized as a Strong Performer in "The Forrester Wave™: Security Service Edge (SSE) Solutions, Q1 2024" report, receiving the highest scores possible, 5.0/5.0, in the global network, innovation, and supporting services & offerings criteria.

We believe this recognition validates our commitment to build SASE "the right way," converging composable network and security services on a global, programmable connectivity cloud.

According to the report:

- "Cloudflare's SSE offering, Cloudflare One, emphasizes network performance and cloud-delivered security to a greater extent than any other offering in this evaluation."
- "With Cloudflare One, the vendor stays 'on brand' by continually innovating SSE workflows and security features at a furious pace."
- "Cloudflare reference customers are enthusiastic, with one stating, 'We are moving away from every other product' and 'Everything can be managed through code.'"
- "Cloudflare is a good choice for enterprise prospects seeking a high-performance, low-maintenance, DevOps-oriented solution."
